backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access control, user approvals, invite‑only mode, and user profile storage with various guards and admin‑only operations.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report listing feature requirements, affected files, components, and tests for chart fixes and debug taps.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing purposes and behavior of many frontend components and pages.
frontend/docs/v48-modecard-resume-button: Documentation describing a UI-only change that reorders Start New Game and Resume Game buttons in ModeCard.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration with routes, layout, AuthGate, and global error fallback components.
frontend/src/components/accepting-gifts/: Table component showing Accepting Gifts win/loss records per ball count.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Clickable APA ball button with color states for scoring and accessibility labels.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball state types and calculates rack point totals including one-away 9-ball adjustments.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Manages scoring for an APA 9-ball rack with ball state tracking, inning flow, auto-dead logic, and match-context-aware point calculation.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results including winner, points, innings, defensive shots, and PPI for both players.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form for creating or editing a real APA match with validation, skill-level logic, connection handling, and save/update operations.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Custom hook managing APA inning flow, active player, inning counts, and turn progression.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Controls gated access based on authentication, approval, admin status, and invite-only mode before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with automatic session handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating or editing a user profile with name and APA skill level, including connection warnings and save logic.
frontend/src/components/history/MatchHis: Table displaying match history with derived APA stats like PPI, aPPI, and win rate, plus navigation to match details.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation controls, profile setup, login button, and connection status handling.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Button and confirmation dialog to delete a match and navigate back or trigger a callback after deletion.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Generic confirmation dialog for ending a match with customizable text and pending state handling.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Card summarizing a match with mode-specific details, score, outcome, and navigation to the match view.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Card for selecting or resuming a game mode with start and optional resume actions.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Builds multiple APA stat time-series from data points and renders combined Recharts line charts inside a card.
frontend/src/components/straight-shot/St: Converts shot count frequencies into a histogram and displays them using a Recharts bar chart.
Renders a table summarizing wins, losses, and first-win dates for Straight Shot sessions.
Plots shot count trends over time using a composed bar and line chart with an average value.
frontend/src/dev/straight-shot-spot-chec: Manual QA checklist for verifying Straight Shot session flow and expected behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Provides a helper to clear and refetch the actor query for reconnecting to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, status, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating match and user data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Defines the 12-level Accepting Gifts progression plus helpers for clamping, retrieving levels, computing max attempts, and updating baseline levels.
Manages Accepting Gifts session state and provides functions to apply attempt results and reset sets between races.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts cleaned APA match stats per player from practice and official matches, computing PPI/aPPI and related fields.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Provides APA 9-ball skill-level-to-points mappings and helpers for formatting and validating skill levels.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines the APA 20‑point match conversion chart and thresholds for determining match outcomes based on loser SL and points.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA Practice match outcomes using targets and the match‑point chart to determine winner and match points.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Implements APA rack scoring, PPI calculations, validation, and aggregation of per‑rack player stats.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaSkillLevelPredic: Predicts APA skill level based on PPI or aPPI by matching ranges to estimated SL values.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaExpected: Contains the official expected PPI lookup table and helpers to bucket win% and retrieve expected PPI by SL.
Derives win/loss/unknown APA outcomes from skill levels and scores and provides a helper that falls back to derivation when didWin is undefined.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Computes official APA PPI/aPPI values and win percentages using match context and validates numeric inputs.
frontend/src/lib/history/matchHistoryRow: Builds concise match result narrative strings based on match mode and available score data.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses user-entered dates for APA logs and determines effective timestamps for sorting and display.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds official APA match log records and derives didWin automatically, re-exporting other match builders.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Constructs APA practice and other non-official match records with UUIDs, stats, and outcome computation.
frontend/src/lib/session/inProgressSessi: Manages in-progress session state per game mode in sessionStorage, including checks and clearing.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsPer: Computes win/loss counts for Accepting Gifts matches grouped by starting ball count.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsSta: Calculates total sessions and rolling averages of ending ball counts for Accepting Gifts matches.
Aggregates official APA match stats including win rate, average PPI, and average aPPI from valid matches.
frontend/src/lib/stats/straightShotStats: Computes straight-shot statistics including averages, trends, histogram data, and win/loss summaries from match history.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Manages Accepting Gifts game state, handling attempts, set progression, persistence, and match saving.
Displays rules and structure of the Accepting Gifts drill, including levels and match format.
Start screen for Accepting Gifts sessions allowing player setup, level selection, and session creation or resume.
Handles APA practice game scoring, state persistence, rack updates, and match completion flow with optional save and retry connection handling.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Provides form to start an APA practice session, including player names, skill levels, duplicate checks, and session management.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Loads an existing official APA match and displays a prefilled edit form, redirecting if the match is missing.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Displays a blank form for creating an official APA match log after the fact.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Shows an access-blocked message and lets the user request approval, with success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays detailed match information with APA‑specific stats and navigation to related player pages.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Shows match history with sorting, tab filters, card/table views, and navigation origin handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with navigation cards for different practice modes and optional link to match history.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page for viewing and managing user approval requests and toggling invite-only mode.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays a player's APA aggregate statistics, charts, win rate, and predicted skill levels.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Provides a deployment smoke-check page with verification checklist and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/stats/StatsPage.tsx: Main stats dashboard showing APA, Straight Shot, and Accepting Gifts analytics with navigation to detailed player stats.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Handles an in-progress Straight Shot session, including shot tracking, session persistence, and match submission.
Static rules panel explaining how the Straight Shot drill works.
Start page for creating or resuming a Straight Shot session with player input, rules, and recent averages.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Utility to extract human-readable messages from various error formats.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Helper functions for normalizing and comparing player names.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds route paths for navigating to a player's stats page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL and hash query parameters, store/retrieve them from sessionStorage, and persist or clear them as needed.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting with an error if it exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, container settings, and enabling several Tailwind plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s build state, including expanded Accepting Gifts overhaul requirements, APA mode design rules, UI/logic constraints, and known issues.
